abilities.desc: Creates multiple images of Naga Siren under her control.DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.notes: Upon casting, existing Mirror Image illusions are destroyed.

abilities.desc: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.
abilities.name: Ensnare

abilities.desc: Every 6 attack from naga and her illusions, the Naga Siren and her images will hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 4.0 seconds.
abilities.name: Rip Tide

abilities.desc: Naga Siren channels for up to {s:AbilityChannelTime} seconds, pulling all ensnared units in a 1400 range towards her at a speed of 150.
abilities.name: Reel In

abilities.desc: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.
abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.notes: The area of the song follows Naga, so if she moves far enough away from affected units, they will wake up.

abilities.desc: Release enemy units from your song so they can be targeted again.
abilities.name: Song of the Siren End
